intelmq.bots.collectors.alienvault_otx package¶

Submodules¶

intelmq.bots.collectors.alienvault_otx.collector module¶

class intelmq.bots.collectors.alienvault_otx.collector.AlienVaultOTXCollectorBot(bot_id: str, start: bool = False, sighup_event=None, disable_multithreading: Optional[bool] = None)¶

Bases: intelmq.lib.bot.CollectorBot

Collect reports from the AlienVault OTX Collector API. Report varies according to subscriptions.

intelmq.bots.collectors.alienvault_otx.collector.BOT¶

alias of intelmq.bots.collectors.alienvault_otx.collector.AlienVaultOTXCollectorBot

Module contents¶

IntelMQ is a solution for IT security teams for collecting and processing security feeds using a message queuing protocol.
